notesStmt.note: Rashi's commentary given in the margin (semi-cursive writing of 17th century) of folio 29r.Previous owner's note, 3v: הצעיר שלום בן שלמה הכהןowner יצו.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Genesis, with punctuation and accents, accompanied with masorah magna and parva.

collation.p: 10 quires of originally10 leaves each, with some leaves cut off from the 4th, 5th and 8th quire. End of the quire signed with Hebrew letters at the end, in the left-hand bottom corner of the page and at the right-hand upper corner at the beginning of the quire. Catchwords are only partially preserved due to mutilation of pages.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Square Yemenite character, of about 15th century.

history.provenance: Acquisition: Mr Nicolas Mavrocordato: purchased by the British Museum from him on 08 October 1881.
